Package com.mygdx.game.Entitys

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.game.Entitys.Entity
com.mygdx.game.Entitys.Ship
All Implemented Interfaces:
CollisionCallBack
Direct Known Subclasses:
NPCShip, Player
public class Ship
extends Entity
implements CollisionCallBack
Base class for game ships, Player & NPC.
